cause.description:
Mona Foundation supports many projects in countries across the world. Below are just some of them.
Brazil ADCAM, Amazonas http://www.monafoundation.org/adcam/adcam.htm
Cambodia CORDE Schools http://www.monafoundation.org/corde/corde.htm
Haiti Anis Zunuzi School New Horizon School http://www.monafoundation.org/zunuzi/zunuzi.htm
CAFT Program http://www.monafoundation.org/caft/caft.htm
India Barli Development Institute for Rural Women http://www.monafoundation.org/barli/barli.htm
Mongolia Mongolian Development Center http://www.monafoundation.org/mongolia/mongolia.htm
Panama Badi School and University http://www.monafoundation.org/badi/badi.htm
Ngabe-Bukle Universidad http://www.monafoundation.org/ngobe-bugle/ngobe-bugle-univ.htm
Ngobe-Bugle Schools http://www.monafoundation.org/ngobe-bugle/ngobe-bugle.htm
Tanzania Ruaha School http://www.monafoundation.org/ruaha/ruaha.htm
USA Full Circle Learning http://www.monafoundation.org/fullcircle/fullcircle.htm
Vietnam Sunflower Mission http://www.monafoundation.org/sunflower/sunflower.htm
1. All children deserve the right to a quality education.
2. We work to raise the status of women and girls because we believe the advancement of civilization requires the full participation of everyone.
3. The process of community building affirms that all people can find the direction and the capacity for development within themselves.
cause.mission: Supporting Grassroots Social-Economic Development Projects with a Focus on Women and Children across the world
